languages.text: "Не дать еретикам захватить звездную гавань и другие важные для расследования объекты. Попутно сломим сопротивление еретиков — большая их часть скрывается среди простолюдинов. Несколько массированных ударов по жилым блокам и лечебницам заставит их бежать. Тут-то мы и добьем мятежную падаль".

"Stop the heretics from taking over the starport and other locations critical to the investigation. At the same time, we will crush the heretics' resistance — most of them are hiding among the commoners, and a series of concentrated strikes against the residential districts and infirmaries will send them running. That is when we'll finish off the rebel carrion."
languages.original_text: "Не дать еретикам захватить звездную гавань и другие важные для расследования объекты. Попутно сломим сопротивление еретиков — большая их часть скрывается среди простолюдинов. Несколько массированных ударов по жилым блокам и лечебницам заставит их бежать. Тут-то мы и добьем мятежную падаль".

languages.text: "Wir verhindern, dass die Ketzer den Raumhafen und andere für die Untersuchung kritische Positionen übernehmen. Gleichzeitig brechen wir ihren Widerstand ... die meisten von ihnen verstecken sich unter den Zivilisten. Einige gezielte Schläge gegen die Wohnbezirke und Krankenhäuser werden sie in die Flucht schlagen. Dann geben wir dem Rebellenpack den Rest."
languages.original_text: "Stop the heretics from taking over the starport and other locations critical to the investigation. At the same time, we will crush the heretics' resistance — most of them are hiding among the commoners, and a series of concentrated strikes against the residential districts and infirmaries will send them running. That is when we'll finish off the rebel carrion."

traits.locale_text: "Wir verhindern, dass die Ketzer den Raumhafen und andere für die Untersuchung kritische Positionen übernehmen. Gleichzeitig brechen wir ihren Widerstand ... die meisten von ihnen verstecken sich unter den Zivilisten. Einige gezielte Schläge gegen die Wohnbezirke und Krankenhäuser werden sie in die Flucht schlagen. Dann geben wir dem Rebellenpack den Rest."

languages.text: « Empêcher les hérétiques de s'emparer de l'astroport et d'autres lieux essentiels à l'enquête. Nous en profiterons pour écraser la résistance des rebelles, dont la plupart se cachent parmi les roturiers. Une série de frappes ciblées contre les districts résidentiels et les infirmeries les mettra en déroute. Il nous suffira alors d'achever ces charognes insurgées. »
languages.original_text: "Stop the heretics from taking over the starport and other locations critical to the investigation. At the same time, we will crush the heretics' resistance — most of them are hiding among the commoners, and a series of concentrated strikes against the residential districts and infirmaries will send them running. That is when we'll finish off the rebel carrion."

traits.locale_text: « Empêcher les hérétiques de s'emparer de l'astroport et d'autres lieux essentiels à l'enquête. Nous en profiterons pour écraser la résistance des rebelles, dont la plupart se cachent parmi les roturiers. Une série de frappes ciblées contre les districts résidentiels et les infirmeries les mettra en déroute. Il nous suffira alors d'achever ces charognes insurgées. »

languages.text: «Impedir que los herejes tomen el puerto estelar y otros emplazamientos cruciales para la investigación. Al mismo tiempo, aplastaremos la resistencia herética; la mayoría se esconden entre los plebeyos, y una serie de ataques concentrados contra los distritos residenciales y las enfermerías los pondrán en fuga. Así aprovecharemos para acabar con toda la carroña rebelde».
languages.original_text: "Stop the heretics from taking over the starport and other locations critical to the investigation. At the same time, we will crush the heretics' resistance — most of them are hiding among the commoners, and a series of concentrated strikes against the residential districts and infirmaries will send them running. That is when we'll finish off the rebel carrion."

traits.locale_text: «Impedir que los herejes tomen el puerto estelar y otros emplazamientos cruciales para la investigación. Al mismo tiempo, aplastaremos la resistencia herética; la mayoría se esconden entre los plebeyos, y una serie de ataques concentrados contra los distritos residenciales y las enfermerías los pondrán en fuga. Así aprovecharemos para acabar con toda la carroña rebelde».

languages.text: “必须阻止异端分子，保护星港与其他至关重要的区域。与此同时，我们会粉碎异端分子的抵抗力量。他们之中大部分人都混迹在平民之间，我们打算对居民区与医院采取集中火力打击，把他们逼出来。届时，我们就可以把那些烂到根上的叛徒统统消灭。”
languages.original_text: "Stop the heretics from taking over the starport and other locations critical to the investigation. At the same time, we will crush the heretics' resistance — most of them are hiding among the commoners, and a series of concentrated strikes against the residential districts and infirmaries will send them running. That is when we'll finish off the rebel carrion."

traits.locale_text: “必须阻止异端分子，保护星港与其他至关重要的区域。与此同时，我们会粉碎异端分子的抵抗力量。他们之中大部分人都混迹在平民之间，我们打算对居民区与医院采取集中火力打击，把他们逼出来。届时，我们就可以把那些烂到根上的叛徒统统消灭。”

languages.text: 「捜査に重要なスターポートや他の拠点を、異端者が占拠するのを防ぎます。同時に、異端者の抵抗を打ち砕きます。ほとんどが一般市民に紛れ込んでいるため、住宅地や医療施設を集中的に攻撃すれば、奴らは逃げるでしょう。その時、反乱軍の残党を徹底的に始末します」
languages.original_text: "Stop the heretics from taking over the starport and other locations critical to the investigation. At the same time, we will crush the heretics' resistance — most of them are hiding among the commoners, and a series of concentrated strikes against the residential districts and infirmaries will send them running. That is when we'll finish off the rebel carrion."

traits.locale_text: 「捜査に重要なスターポートや他の拠点を、異端者が占拠するのを防ぎます。同時に、異端者の抵抗を打ち砕きます。ほとんどが一般市民に紛れ込んでいるため、住宅地や医療施設を集中的に攻撃すれば、奴らは逃げるでしょう。その時、反乱軍の残党を徹底的に始末します」

languages.text: "Kâfirlerin, soruşturmayı tehlikeye atabilecek konumları ve yıldız limanını ele geçirmelerine engel olmak. Bu sırada da dirençlerini kırmaya odaklanacağız. Çoğu, sıradan yurttaşlar arasında saklanıyor. Yerleşim bölgeleri ve revirler üzerine yapılacak bir dizi yoğun saldırıyla çil yavrusu gibi dağılmaya başlayacaklardır. Bu da isyancı leşçillerin sonu olacak."
languages.original_text: "Stop the heretics from taking over the starport and other locations critical to the investigation. At the same time, we will crush the heretics' resistance — most of them are hiding among the commoners, and a series of concentrated strikes against the residential districts and infirmaries will send them running. That is when we'll finish off the rebel carrion."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlerin, soruşturmayı tehlikeye atabilecek konumları ve yıldız limanını ele geçirmelerine engel olmak. Bu sırada da dirençlerini kırmaya odaklanacağız. Çoğu, sıradan yurttaşlar arasında saklanıyor. Yerleşim bölgeleri ve revirler üzerine yapılacak bir dizi yoğun saldırıyla çil yavrusu gibi dağılmaya başlayacaklardır. Bu da isyancı leşçillerin sonu olacak."
